rules_text:
When this creature enters, create four implant tokens with haste counters. [i](They’re token artifacts with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery”)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control attacks, if it entered the battlefield this turn, it gains flying until end of turn.
